name: Kishin
description:
Kishin is a local multiplayer brawler game about using telekenesis and psychic powers to kill eachother with boxes. Kishin is made in a self hosted weekend Game Jam and is made by three people.

Controls

Gamepads plugged into the PC are HIGHLY recommended but you can use the keyboard as well. TIP: Hold down the [jump] button to keep floating.  [action] button to channel a block and aim to give it a direction.

Player 1 keyboard

movement / aiming / join: WASD

jump: W (hold to keep floating)

action: SPACE

start game: ENTER

Player 2 keyboard

movement / aiming / join: ← → ↑ ↓

jump: ↑ (hold to keep floating)

action: Right Shift

start game: ENTER

Controller (xbox)

movement / aiming: left stick

jump / join: A

action: B

Tips and Tricks
  • Be fast and give multiple commands to a box
  • Catch a box in the air
  • Shoot a box down while standing on the box to launch yourself up
  • Catch a box out of the air
  • Channeled boxes block incoming boxes
  • Launch box down while standing on the box. when in the air channel the box again to shoot the box down from above.
Authors

A game by Gideon Hoogeveen, Sigrid Stoeltje (portfolio) and Tom de Kler
